ShortDescription.Value: Give your city a bold cultural edge with vibrant Chinese-style graffiti—perfect with China Packs!

Publish.LongDescription:
Bring urban energy and cultural flair to Cities: Skylines II with the Chinese Graffiti Pack! Inspired by the Guo Chao (国潮) movement, this pack features bold, vibrant street art blending traditional Chinese elements with modern graffiti aesthetics. Perfect for adding personality to city walls, alleyways, and commercial districts, these decals give your builds an edgy, contemporary vibe.
🔥 Best paired with China Packs to create a fusion of tradition and modern street culture!
✅ 10+ high-resolution (2K) graffiti decals featuring dragons, calligraphy, mythological creatures, and urban art. ✅ Perfect for walls, storefronts, underpasses, and cultural hotspots. ✅ Located in the "DECALS" tab for easy access.
🔨 How to Use: 🎨 Works great with Move It and Extra Detailing Tool 🏙️ Apply to walls, streets and buildings to create a vibrant city atmosphere 🔥 Combine with China Packs for a complete cultural street-style experience
🛑 Known Limitations: 🚧 Decals may not fully conform to curved or sloped surfaces 🎨 Colors may appear different depending on your screen settings
💬 Got questions? Need tips? Drop a comment!
